formatted_address: Ave 2 outside Khatib Mrt Stn, Singapore
name: Khatib

reviews.text: Best way to get to Singapore Zoo, night safari, bird park and river wonders! The bus even has usb power points!!

Walking  distance to Yishun Town Garden Yishun Town Square hawker centre Sheng Siong Supermarket. MRT with beautiful views of Reservoir with breezy greenery away from busy cityscapes. Next to plenty of choices for local hawker delights after shopping banking grosseries postage dinning with hawker delights and Western Int'l delights supermarket amenities  and entertainments. One MRT stop to  Yishun MRT bus interchange Northpoint City with  plenty of shopping banking dinning library postage groceries supermarkets services facilities and amenities  nearby. Friendly fast attentive cosy comfy welcoming ambience for romantic intimates groups students tourists Expats and families. Next to community clubs and residential committee.

Khatib Hub cum Mall embraces the  NTUC
Supermarket,  CK  Departmental Store,
MacDonalds and more than 5 Coffee Shops.
Essentially,  it offers all the local crusine:
Hainanese Chicken Rice, Siew Yoke. Chay
Siew and Duck Rice, Cai Png, Bak Choy Mee,
Fried Hokkien Mee,  Fried Oysters,
Porridge, Nasi Lemak, Yong Tau Foo etc.
The Khatib MRT Station is opposite the
Big Field.  It is closed to the Community
Centre as well.
Basic metro station in the suburbs, has bus shuttle service to Singapore zoo right outside.

I like how there are areas that allow people to sit and wait (I know not if it was intentional). With a supermarket, a small eatery, a bakery, a few ATMs and an AXS machine, i think it has conveniently located facilities there as well. A particular cat can be seen there in the mornings as well (at the time of this review), and that's a big bonus to me.
